title: WHEN will come FIX for FPS?
body: The game is unplayable after update 7.24 many peoples have that issue with fps,lag spikes, WE want FIX

replies.body:
First double check that you've got the latest driver updates as usual, but I would also try disabling the Snowdown map assets through the in-game options if you haven't yet. 

Some players noticed an fps drop simply from the fancy new Snowdown SR map elements. If that doesn't help, try running a quick clean boot and let me know how League runs that way.
y i have 120 fps by doing nothing and when i walk i dropp to like 10
BIG Thank you Broporo ist fix my problem
